{"name": "Community Assistance Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Serves Sandy Springs, GA residents (30319, 30327, 30328, 30338, 30342, 30350, 30358, 30092)
* Requirements
	* Must live in the Sandy Springs areas.
	* Photo ID for the adults living in the house whole
	* ID for the minors who live in the house whole.
	* Proof of address (current lease or utility bills, government mail, etc.)
	* Proof of income (paystub, SNAP cards, Medicaid cards but it can also be a verbal declaration)", "email": "", "url": "https://ourcac.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "120 Northwood Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Sandy Springs", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30342", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.911571, "longitude": -84.3827587}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 552-4015", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Zip code restrictions"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "For minors: Bring passport or Birth Certificate"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}]}
